text: Mark Walter Olson (March 17, 1943 â€“ September 12, 2018) was an American economist and politician. He was a member of the Board of Governors of the U.S. Federal Reserve from 2001 to 2006. He resigned on June 21, 2006 in order to run the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board. Olson was born in Fergus Falls, Minnesota. He died on September 12, 2018 in Washington, D.C. at the age of 75.Former FED Governor and ABA President Mark Olson Dies at 65 ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American economists Category:Politicians from Minnesota Category:Writers from Minnesota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mark W. Olson
